pp1.7:0.3_0: The Seven training rules on reference to the rule.
pp1.7:1.1_0: He then enjoyed himself with food, thinking,
pp1.7:2.2_0: They emerge, emerge, crossed over, and emerges on the surface. And when the sun rises, they emerge into the sky risen, crossed over, and emerged on the far shore.
pp1.7:3.1_0: The one freed both ways, the one freed by wisdom, the personal witness, the one attained to view, the one freed by faith, the follower of the teachings, and the follower by faith.
